text: Pouring at Sierra Nevada beer camp. Pours a hazed orange amber with a thin white head.. Big acid, musk, fruit, wood. Medium bodied, long acid and wood. Tangy with acid, fruity.

On tap at The Bottle Shop Bermondsey. Clear amber colour lasting white head. Fruity and sour at the same time. Tropical fruit pineapple and then a lovely balanced sourness. Really good beer. Dry finish. Sour and bitter. Excellent
UPDATED: JUN 10, 2017 On tap at polyhistor. Clear yellow colour small white head. Nose is sour, light durian. Taste is medium-high sourness light bitterness. Definitive durian in the taste as well.
√Åcida, con ese toque lupulado frutal que le da muchos matices. Seca y refrescante. Riqu√≠sima.
Draught. K√ò. Creamy white good mostly lasting head. Yellow colour. Moderate malty and hoppy sour aroma. Heavy sour and bitter flavor. Long great finish. Creamy palate. Nice.

Draught sample at Copenhagen Beer Festival 2017. Slightly hazy golden amber colour with a thin, white head. Tart, fruity aroma with barnyard, oak, lemons, citrus fruits, bretts and spicy notes. Taste is sour. Medium bodied. Finishes lasting tart fruity with oak and bretts. Fruity accents. Excellent Sour.
Der Sour Querdenker. Mosaic machts m√∂glich. Sanft verblumt und kr√§uterig zitronig, wird er schnell zur Nerdyabfahrt ‚ú®üéÜüëΩüòÅ ... A Big Draft Glass im KOELSCHIP Copenhagen.
Baghaven, Copenhagen: pours orange with little head. Aroma is funky with citrusy hops. Good body. pretty good. Interesting take on the lambic style.
Aroma - intense and pleasant, with lot of sourness, home made borsh, yeasts, some hops. Taste - very sourish, vine shoots, wild yeasts, soured and young white wine. Very good and very sourish.
Bottle 330ml (BB 07.03.2022). Clear, golden colour with white head, nice lacing. Very good lambic, sour, a little bit bitter, refreshing, drinkable, really tasty.

UPDATED: APR 30, 2017 Kiwi hops (literally), fresh crisp appeal, light golden. Crispy bubbly, light plucky, yummy. Crisp and complex and different, totally worth the try. (On tap at Ol & Brod Copenhagen)

5.5%ABV. Lambic.

Tapped out gold. 6¬∫SRM.

Nose is spontan with a cavalcade of nice thick barnyard aromas, dirty straw, light mold, dust, manure, mud.

Mouthfeel is watery juicy light. Palate is predictably wheat flour, water biscuits. Hops are more pronounced with lemon zest and grapefruit peel but not fresh, more in a preserved format.
Duft svag funk frisk citrus smag frisk lime honing melon lidt mandariner frisk citrus

BOTTLE 33 CL. Clear golden, white head, sediment. Tart green fruit, funk, but also quite fruity for a lambic, Orchard fruit and even notes of honey. Super dry sour taste, nutty notes of green fruit seeds - classic. Good, the hops gave it a nice twist.
Draft pour at Teku Seattle, light crisp golden pour thin head. Tart raspberry aroma with a thin raspberry taste.
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupe≈Çniania profilu na ratebeer. Najlepszy z Dryhop√≥w, podtrzymujƒô

Bottle from Whole Foods. Pours clear gold with frothy, white head. Nose is tart fruit, lactic acidity, earthy florals. Tastes tart, very fruity, with spare hops, and notes of lemon, pear, melon, and tangerine. Tart and smooth finish; very complex.

Z≈Çote ze skromnƒÖ pianƒÖ. Aromaty cytrusowe i kwiatowe. W smaku przyjemnie kwa≈õne, cytrynowo jab≈Çkowe z wyra≈∫nƒÖ nutƒÖ chmielu. trochƒô ma≈Ço przypomina klasyczny lambik ale i tak bardzo przyjemnie siƒô je pije.
Pours clear golden. Aroma is sour, lemon, slightly funky. Taste is citric, lemon, balanced. refreshing.
Bottle thanks to Rainer. Pours a hazy gold with with small white head that diminishes quickly. The aroma is strong funk, wood, earth. Medium body, apple skin, oak, funk, nice tartness, very nice.

12oz bottle. Clear golden color with a white head. Sour tart fruit aroma. Very tart sour fruit peach apple flavour. Medium body. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle from Vinmonopolet, Kvadrat. Pours hazy golden with a small creamy white head. Spicy fruity aroma. Weak tart and funky fruity taste, high carbonated, weak dry fruity nice finish.

Bottle. Pours clear orange with almost no head. Aroma of funk, wet leaves, barnyard, lemon, fruity, floral, grapes, vinous, very inviting. Taste is acidic, sour, vinous with lot of grapes and floral taste. Medium body, slick texture, lively carbonation, sour finish. Very drinkable, great!

Bottle at Hundholmen, Bod√∏. Has a clear amber colour with a small off-white head. Aroma of bubble gum, flowers, barnyard, rowanberries, dry hay, apricot and some vinegar. Sour and fruity flavour with peaches, vinegar, barnyard, lemon and apple cider. Has a slick mouth feel. medium body and a light bitterness. A both sour and fruity lambic, well balanced and nice.

Thanks to Travlr! 330 ml. bottle sampled @ Billie¬ís Bier Kaf√©taria. Sparkling golden, lightly hazy faintly off-white head. Nose is lemon sour, sour green apple & white grape. Taste is big juicy lacitc lemon jucie sour, white grape & green apple big juicy fruit hop notes, finish is lemon juice. Body is sparkling lemon juice, lightly lactic. Fruity, lower sour. Very nice but lacks the funk and complexity that I expect from a lambiek. Very nice dry hopped sour.
Bottle at Billie¬ís. Clear golden color. Earthy herbal aroma. Taste is earthy dusty lemon. OK.

Aroma: complex sour aroma with citrus.
Appearance: golden, a bit haze with small white head.
Taste: complex sour taste turns into a little bitter.
Palate: dry finish like after white wine, medium carbonation.

On tap at Nubben. Deep golden with thin white head. Aroma is clear and complex, citrus, funky complex lambic notes, acetic, barnyard and tropical fruits. Taste is similar, complex sour notes, acetic, fruit, tropical notes with fairly high bitterness. Good and highly drinkable!
Dry, brittle the hops are quite fun here. Semi oily body, a tad flat. Finishes lightly puckering.

Flaska p√• En Trappa Upp, Pitchers, √ñrebro. Klar, gyllene i f√§rgen. Rena och klara smaker av grape, citrus, citruszest, l√§tt touch av vin√§ger. Lagom stor och v√§l avv√§gd syrlighet. Riktigt fr√§sch och bra balanserad. V√§ldigt gott!

Bottle. Golden pour. Aroma of tart, horseblanket, tropical fruit, pineapple and mango. Taste of tart pineapple, mango, sour unripe mandarine, wheat and orange. Very nice, but a bit too harsh to be 4+.

Bouteille de 330ml. Une belle robe dor√©e avec une mousse blanche. Un nez l√©g√®rement terreux avec des herbes et des √©pices. La bouche est agr√©able comme les autres mono-houblons, mais moins explosives. Les saveurs sont plus occult√©s par les levures sauvages. Tout de m√™me agr√©able.

33cl bottle @Cimmeria, Oviedo. 04-06-2015.
BBD:02-04-2020.
In short: fruity sour ale.
Pours hazy bright gold with little white head. Short head retention, poor lacing. Peachy, tart, leathery nose. Might body, average carbonation, crispy texture. Taste is moderate tart, dry, fruity peach, still some residual swetness.

pours hazy bright golden with a reviving white head offering good retention and lacing. funky exotic citrus, passionfruits, touch of buttery mangoes, other tropical fruits, complex flora - light to medium acidity, peppery soured wheat, salt, kaffir leaves. moderate carbonation, light body - oily; dry, tart and woodsy (if not tannic) spicy-citrusy medium long finish. fairly astringent/tannic and funky with very nice tropical lambic features.

11.2 oz single bottle from Molly¬ís Spirits. Hazy orange appearance with a small, lingering white head. Enticing aroma, sour, funky, woody, zesty citrus and tropical fruitiness with hints of barnyard. Similar flavor, adding mild acidity and a mild hop bitterness with hints of herbs and pine. Light to medium body with a crisp, light puckering feel, ample carbonation and a light dry, light oaky finish. Pretty nice overall!

Tap at the Jeffrey with lunch they had Mikkeller tap take over last night. Fine clear orange pour. Nose is citrus and oak. Tastes woody, some lemon, mango funky lactose and the glue side of an envelop. Dry and funky. Fairly delicious

Bottle at billies. Pours clear blonde, small white head. Smell is Sharp sour, funk, some Wood, mellow bitterness. Mild hoparoma. Taste is full, mild sourness, very malty , mild hoppyness. Very balanced and Nice. Not really a lambic, i assume, but Nice beer nevertheless.
Aroma is tropical fruit/slight kiwi, Mosaic hops and lambic/funk. The flavor is tropical fruit, Mosaic hops, sugar/medium sweetness, malts and a funky/earthy finish.

Lambic - Unblended? Uh sure whatev, but I believe that about as much as anything Drumpf says. Clear bright golden with a small white head. Aroma is barnyard, citrus, herbal notes, lemon, ammonia. Flavor is tart and dry with significant ammonia notes and decent herbal/citrus hops. A bit astringent on the feel, high carbonation. Decent but fell short of expectations.
Yellow, nice head, fruity aroma, lemon, olives, green tea, sourish and fresh, sour flavor, awesome, fruity, lemon, olives, green tea, fun, medium bodied.

(33 cl. BB.07/04/21) Une dentelle d√©core ce verre qui a la couleur de plusieurs lambics. Au nez, voil√† justement ce lambic agr√©able et m√™me de grande qualit√©. Mais d¬ío√π vient ce lambic? Boon? Difficile pour moi, par contre, d¬íidentifier le Mosaic. Peut-√™tre est-il responsable de ces ar√¥mes de terre, de poivre et d¬íherbes qui semblent s¬íimpr√©gner dans mon cerveau? Qu¬í√† cela ne tienne, √ßa sent vraiment bon et c¬íest bien plaisant. Au go√ªt, j¬íy trouve du zeste de citron et des pamplemousses jeunes et vifs qui compl√©mentent de belle fa√ßon la trame ma√Ætresse. En bouche, j¬íai l¬íimpression d¬íun corps de moyenne densit√© avec un p√©tillement vivant et une texture presque huileuse. En finale, des notes concentr√©es de pomelo et de lime et de citron vert perdurent un tr√®s bon moment.

Bottle at mikkeller SF. Pours hazy golden, medium white head, great lacing. Aroma is tropical, dank, passionfruit, guava. Flavor is light tart, very light funk, clean, tropical citrus. Light plus body.

Bouteille 330ml. Couleur orang√©e voil√©e, mousse blanche. Ar√¥me de Brett, agrumes, malt, zeste de citron, un peu de sueur, foin. Go√ªt d¬íagrumes, Brett, acidit√© moyenne-√©lev√©e, amertume moyenne, zeste de pamplemousse. Carbonatation moyenne, corps moyen.
Bottle. Clear golden with minimum foam. Aroma is fruits and lemon. Taste is kemon, malt, salt and som yeast.

Bottle. 5.5%. Best before 07.04.21. Pours a hazy, light golden, with an off-white head. Good lacing. Sour, fruity aroma. Hint of berries. A bit funky. Light citrus as it warms. Flavour is sour and fruity as well. Notes of hops, apricot, mango, hint of citrus. A bit funky as it warms. Dry, sour and bitter finish, a bit vinous. Lingering further dryness, with light apricot and mango notes. A bit earthy as well. Overall good. 07.10.16.

On bottle from Vinmonopolet Norway, on order. Golden color, ok foam.
Medium aroma intensity; funky, light hops, some fruitiness and stable. Medium body & complexity. On the sour side. Enjoyable 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Disigt guldf√§rgad. Sur, citrus, torr, fruktig, schysst humlad, l√§tt smak fr√•n ljus malt. Riktigt trevlig. @sbwf16

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle @home. Pours orange with quite a biggish head. Nose is funky and fruity, lemons. Taste is big lemon, sour lemon, a touch salty, big sour, big citrus, sour.
On tap at Mikkeller Bar SF. Pours dark gold with a modest white head and a tropical fruit aroma. There is a tart pale malt flavor also with tropical fruit, and a more bitter finish.
Bottle shared by Mart, thanks! Slightly hazy golden amber beer, white head. Nose is funk, tart notes, fruit. Flavor is funk, hops, mango. Dry and tart finish. Crisp stuff.
Bottle (from mikkeller webshop). Pours amber. Aroma is sour, funky, citrus, slight sweetness. Flavor is sour and bitter, some funk, some citrus, some acidity. Finish is dry bitter. Overall: good.

330ml bottle (thanks Mart). Clear deep golden color. Small size, white head, stays. Leather, fruity, acidic, farmhouse, bit yeasty in aroma. Acidic, fruity, raw oranges, bit of apples and farmhouse in taste. Acidic and farmhouse in aftertaste. Refreshing brew.
Sample at SBWF 2016. A bit hazy golden with small white head. Fresh and nicely tart with mango, passionfruit and some light grain.

Cloudy golden, moderate white head. Good lacing. Nose of leather, horse blanket, pear, light vinegar. Light body. Dry taste. Fruity, medium sour, a bit wild, light bitterness. Very refreshing. High class.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
How : bottle Appearance : hazy deep orange with a tiny white head. Aroma : lemon, unripe berries, tropical fruits, grass, floral and some herbal tones. Palate : medium body, average carbonation.

Pours a pretty clear golden with a medium white head that leaves intense lacing. Nose is of lambic-esque funk and grass. I wish the hops were better rendered like they are in To √òl¬ís Sur Amarillo for example but it is still pretty nice. Taste offers more of the hops, more fruity with some melon angles this time, with a moderate tartness. Dry. The lambic impressions are good, which is not always the case with this serie. Body is light, carbonation moderate and it is super refreshing. A nice hoppy sour that could use a little more hops IMO.

Bottle (330 ml) at home. Almost clear orangey-golden with a small white head leaving little lacing. Aroma is of citrusy hops, funk, mineral notes, mild cheesy presence and oak. Taste is moderately sour with citrus, nice funk, mineral notes, cheesy presence, oak spiciness, hints of caramel and mild grass. Medium body. Soft carbonation. Oily mouthfeel. A tad acidic finish with oak and funk. Another very good SpontanDryhop which is a high class dry-hopped sour series so far.

tap at Salon Piva. Golden color with higher white head. Aroma: sour fruity, malt, hop at background. Taste: acidic fruity, with hoppy notes and pale malt. Higher carbonation. Interesting and good balanced beer.

Tap at Salon piva. Mosaic with its garlicy weirdness fits well in this moderately to highly sour beer. Clean impression, high carbonation, refreshing and easy drinking. Lightly to moderately funky. Quite good.
On tap at Bishops Arms √ñrebro. Tart smell with citrus. Similar tart taste with citrus and some light hops. Noticeable bitterness. The hops are hidden by the tartness. Nice though. Refreshing.

October 1, 2015. Bottle at SBWF. 
Clear golden with a small white head. Aroma is very hoppy and fruity, light funky with mango, pineapple, orange zest, green apple skins, lemon, grass, barnyard, minerals. Taste is fruity, tart and funky. Finish is tart fruity with lemon, green apple, passionfruit, a touch of fruity sweetness with mango and pineapple, some barnyard notes. Light to medium bodied, average carbonation. 

Very nice aroma with the fruity and funky blend.
Bottle 33 cl. Aroma: fruity, wine vinegar, citrus, floral. Taste: sour, fruit, citrus, apple vinegar, very good.
Bottle. Clear golden color, minimum white head. Aroma is sour, tart, fruity, woody, zest, oranges. Taste is medium sour, tart, woody, citrusy, hoppy and dry finish

Bottle Kindle shared by lukka19, many thanks. Unclear orange color with small white head. Sour lemony, vinous aroma with citrus hops. Sour taste with bayrnard, lemon, wood, grapes, Light hoppy bitterness in finish. Tasty.
Bottle by lukka19, many thanks. Pours golden color, white head. Aroma is sour, grapes, bret. Taste is sour, bret, lemon, hops. Nice.

Keg@ Mikkeller and Friends bottle shop. Hazy amber, small white head. Hoppy citrus aroma, tangerines, red apples, hay, herbal and minerals. Soft and smooth mouthfeel, mild carbonated. Mild tart taste, green apples, lemon, grapefruit, floral and grassy hoppy. Great thirst quencher!

330 ml bottle at the Hoppy Pub, Thessaloniki. Almost clear golden color with white head. Yeasty, light malty and light hoppy aroma, funky, citrusy fruity, some caramel notes. Sweet and acidic taste. Medium oily body with soft carbonation.
Tropical fruit and funk in good balance in this one. Aromatic and tasty, moderately acidic.
330ml bottle from Beer Gonzo. Pours hazy amber, foamy off-white head. Aroma is brilliantly vibrant sour mosaic. Taste is wonderfully crisp with sharp mosaic citrus. This is ridiculously good.

Aroma: tart, fruity, citrus, earthy, leaves, cheesy (blue), gentle barnyard.
Appearance: pale to orangy, clear, white foam, minimal head, ok retention.
Taste: similar to aroma but with more pronounced fruitiness, cheese taste. Sourness is light to medium (expected a lot more as it is unblended style lambic), some light bitterness present as well, with low dryness. 
light body, slick feel, average carbonation, long sour and slightly bitter-dry finish. 
Overall: ok level of complexity, expected a bit more though. Interesting modern interpretation.

330ml bottle from Brewdog shop. 
Thin white head disappears quickly, nice wee bit lacing. Hazy golden amber body. Nose is funky citrus, yeast, honey. Flavour is sharp citrus, tart, yeast, bread, good tart finish, a little toffee, sour apple at the end. Medium carbonation, sharp fizz on the tongue, very dry finish. Cracking sour.

Bottle. Pours slight hazy golden with a white head. Aroma is mellow funky with notes of stable, hay, oak, green apples and slight gooseberries. Also some plenty hoppy notes in there. The taste is tart and slight hoppy with oaky and funky notes. Also some citrus and green apples. Good stuff!

Testad p√• Mellbygatans √∂lskola. Ser ut som en grumlig lager. Doft av brett och humle. R√§tt djup bra smak, brett blandat med humle ger en r√§tt sp√§nnande smak

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle. Hazy golden with a medium sized off white head. Sour nose with barnyard, minerals, citrus and flowers. Flavour has lychee, flowers, honey, barnyard, minerals, lemon and hay. Light sweet, medium sour. Fruity and lemony finish. Slightly agressiv on the sourness in the finish.
Bottle. Pale orange, clear liquid, not much of a head. Aroma of grapefruit, zest. Taste is medium sour. Good.

19-JUN-2016, bottle @ Morten. :-)
Low white on hazy golden. 
Tart, fruity and dry-hopped. Bitter, tart. Nice and fresh.
Bottle shared. Clear golden with a small white head. Aroma of gooseberry, green hops, citrus, fruits, light funk notes. Flavour is light moderate sour. Light to medium bodied with soft carbonation.

33cl bottle shared at the June THT.
Thin ring white head. Hazy golden pour. Bitter/sour aftertaste

Bottle at THT. Slight hazy light golden with fizzy short lasting white head. Lots of sour gooseberries, light cheese, green onions, quite funky, lime, white wine vinegar, some bandaids and cotton. Under medium sour and bitter. Medium bodied with fizzy carbonation.
Sampled at THT June tasting. Clear golden pour with a thin white head. Smells hoppy, lightly funky and bitterness. Sour notes of vinegar, bitter green hops and some barnyard funk. Dry and refreshing.

(Mikkeller SpontanDryHop Mosaic) Bottle 330 ml from bursprak, thanks Erik! Served into a Cantillon taster, ABV 5.5%
Bright golden yellow colour on the body, crystal clear, with a big and thin white head on top, disappearing quickly.
Aroma has funk, dust, wood, grass, unripe green grapes, hops, citrus, lemon leaves.
Taste is a combination of sourness and bitterness with the former winning eventually and lasting for a good bit of time. Flavous of grass, lemon leaves and lemon flowers, sour green grapes, some funky notes, wood.
Medium thin body with the carbonation on the high side, quite tart on the palate.
Excellent.

Tap @ Mikkeller, Aarhus. Hazy golden with a white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, barnyard and moderate hoppy - citrus. Flavor is medium sweet, moderate acidic and moderate bitter. Dry, moderate acidic and moderate bitter finish. 090616

Draught @ Mikkeller Bar, Aarhus. Pours dark yellow with a white head, light lacings. Aroma of sourness, barnyard, leather, wood, tart grapes, grass, citrus, lemonpeel, grapefruit. Flavor is quite sour, light bitter, barnyard, dusty, leather, grassy, citrus, grapes, lemon, grapefruit. Medium body, average carbonation, dry and acidic finish. 090616
Tap @ Mikkeller, Aarhus. Nice head with good duration. Color is golden. Aroma and taste are sour malt, barnyard, stable, leather, fruits and hops. Nice sour finish.

Tap @ Mikkeller Aarhus, 5,5%. Hazy golden wit small white head. Aroma is malt, grapefruit, peach, barnyard, pine, hop and lemon. Flavour is malt, tart, barnyard, grapefruit, peach, grapefruit, little sweet, medium dry, zest, citric and orange peel.

UPDATED: JUN 2, 2016 Bottle, thanks @vestergaard. Pours a hazy yellow with a thin (almost non-existing) lacing. Aroma of citrus fruits, vinegar and funk. Taste is bitter from hops, lovely sour. Perhaps like biting into a sour apple. A bit dry, with an crisp feel.

On tap. @El L√∫pulo Feroz, Oviedo 27/05/2016
Color amarillo, aromas lupulados, frutales, acidez integrada con el lupulo.
Cerveza peculiar.

golden, unclear orange, small white head, very hoppy aroma with "coconut" and Vermouth, soursmell, in the background, little funk, smell reminds me of Oerbier, start with some sweetness, citric, sour, really dry, medium funky, more complex as the Simcoe Version, nice fruit, mouthfeel is creamy and a little thick

330ml bottle from Mikkeller webshop. Yellow golden colour, white foam head leaving lacing and aroma of funk, citrus rind, tropical fruits, hoppy. Taste is grains, lemon rind, orange juice, funk, hop resins, sour and tangy, with some bitterness. Medium bodied, soft to medium bodied, dry funky hoppy bitter finish. Very drinkable.
Draught at Mikkeller & Friends. Hoppy tart goodness. My first pick of the crazy 42 tap takeover.
From tap at Mikkeller & Friends. Hqzy orangeq colour with a white ehad. Aroma and flavour of fruit, crispy, citric, oak and barnyard.

On tap at BD57, july 7th 2015. Hazy orange body, nice white head. Aroma of peach, oranges, funky barnyard. Fresh and appealing. Taste is sour, very fruity with grapes, peach, grapefruit, dry and nice, medium bitterness. Good body, tart fruity finish with a lasting sourness. Quite nice!
Bottle at one man down tasting. Clear, tart, dry, lemon, lemon zest, hops. Nice and refreshing.

Pours hazy golden with thin white head. Nose is fruity and sour. Aromas are citrus (lemon), rotten fruits, herbal hops. Average carbonation, medium body. Long acid and lemony finish.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

bottle sample, poured a hazy deep orange colour with a white head. less tropical fruits compared to the citra, more floral, citrus, and blood orange. funk, and green apples, spiced yeast, tart green apples, tart finish. nice

Botella 33 cl tomada en el momento en llamas el 27..01..2015. (r74). Fcpref 02..04..2020. Color √°mbar tostado turbio con bastante espuma blanca. Perfecta combinaci√≥n de √°cidos con toques finales amargos. Imprescindible dentro del estilo. Cuerpo medio con gas y espumoso. Para repetir sin duda.

Hazy orange color with a small, white head. Aroma is hoppy and funky at the same time with fruits like peach, grapes and pears along hay, grass and barnyard notes. Taste starts tart and funky. Intense lambic type flavors along bitter and fruity hops. Body is medium to light, smooth but also well carbonated. Aftertaste is funky and bitter. Overall it¬ís really nice hoppy wild ale. Tart, bitter and fruity.

33cl bottle. It pours a clean golden color with a medium white head. Aroma is tart acidic with plenty I lemons and stone fruit, tropical fruit hops and horse blanket. Taste is lightly sweet and medium dry and sour with tangy lemon juice notes alongside notes if grass straw barnyard, mango and peaches. Medium bodied with good carbonation. Overall, top

So frickning weird. Hops and acidic sour beer a bad combo in my opinion. The astringency from the hops and the acetic acid is just wrong. No funk here just a bad clash between otherwise two great things. Not a fan.

Bottle. Teku. Golden, medium hazy with medium, white head. Medicore lacing and head retention. Nice, medium aroma of tropical fruits together with funky, vinous and lemon notes. Taste is sligthly sour and dry. Medium body, soft carbonation, highly drinkable. Finish is dry and hoppy. In overall very nice combination of lambic notes with hoppy features. Definetely worth trying

Pours clear amber with low white head. Aroma of apples, grapes, kiwi, citrus. Taste is crisp and apple fresh sour with a mellow lightly sweet finish. Light, crisp body with average carbonation. Very refreshing.

Bottle at pizza hatt
Clear amber minimal white head.
Aroma of berries, lemon
Taste sour and fizzy, dry and tart fresh lemon.
Some bitterness. 
Not messy, clean feel

Bottle at Pizza hatt. 
Pours clear Amber and flat. 
Aroma of apples with a hint of lemon. 
Tastes like a alcoholic and hoppy Champis (Apple and grape soda)
Big fruity, funky aromas followed by big fruity, funky flavours. The tropical fruits of mosaic are a perfect pairing with the sour, barnyard funk. Tart & refreshing. Lovely.

Butelka 0,33l. Kolor z≈Çoty wpadajƒÖcy w pomara≈Ñczowy, piana nik≈Ça trzyma siƒô dobrze. Aromat cytrus√≥w intensywny. Smak cytrusy, wytrawne piwo orze≈ºwiajƒÖce, goryczka ≈õrednia, na podniebieniu chmiele i cytrusy.Bardzo dobre piwo.
Hazy amber color, off-white head. Citrus nose, grapefruit, sour notes, caramel, light malty and fruity. Sour taste, lemon, funky, grass, bitter lemon peel. Medium to light body, soft carbonation.

330mL bottle, pours an opaque cloudy dark orange with a small white head. Aroma brings lovely funk and tropical fruity dry hopping. Flavour is similar, with leather, moderate funk and rather intense dry hopping. Really well hopped, with a nice dry, tart finish. Excellent beer.
Keg at Ushers. Hazy orange. Nose is sour, brett, vinous notes. Taste is sour, very dry, funky, lots of citrus. Nice.
Keg at ushers. Pours deep pale orange, nose is bretty, funky, citrus, taste is sour, juicy fruit, dry finish.
Tap golden colour with no head.Arom is sourish and dry bitter with taste of lemon and vinagar nice dry and bitter with flavor of fruits and acid but over all very nice.

Draft. A golden beer with a lazing beige head. The aroma has notes of lemons, straw, spices, and brett. The flavor is acidic with notes of spices, hops, brettanomyces, and lemons, leading to a tart finish.

Bottle 330ml. [ As Mikkeller Spontandryhop Mosaic ].Unclear medium orange yellow color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, moderate to heavy yeasty, barnyard, leather, grapes, apple - green apples, citrus, lemon, light horse blanket. Flavor is moderate sweet and light to light moderate acidic with a long duration, tart, tart apple, horse blanket, manure, citrus, fresh hops. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20150911]

From trade with fonefan, many thanks!

33cl bottle. Leicht tr√ºbes dunkel goldgelbes Bier mit einer fingerbreiten wei√üen Schaumkrone. Geruch leicht s√§uerlich fruchtig, holzig, trocken. Geschmack sehr s√§uerlich, Kraut, leicht holzig, angenehme dezente Hopfennote, lecker!

Gylden klar skum hvid 
Citrus lime frugt frugt stald 
Bitter lidt sur lidt s√∏d lidt

Keg. Leeds International Beer Festival. Hazy gold. Thin, lasting, white head. Sour, crunchy apple. Blueberry. Red gooseberry. Blueberry yoghurt. Taste is soft sour. Moderately dry. Plenty of hop bitterness. Zingy, tart, lively palate. Finishes long, fresh, tart, and bitter. Lots going off.

Keg, The Dog of Leicester. Nose mango lassi- fresh and keen with a discreet neigh of edge. Fine tangy mellow lactic offness, unripe mango sour, passion fruit pips. Sour but not. Tarnished blonde freckled with lace. Minor hop excursions yet all about the mellow funk. Cheeky refresher. Fuck off expensive, mind.
Piƒôkny zapach, funky, ko≈Ñska derka, z mn√≥stwem owoc√≥w tropikalnych i cytrynowego chmielu. Kwa≈õny smak, funky z owocowym chmielem. ≈örednie tre≈õciwe. ≈öwietna sprawa, bardzo orze≈∫wiajƒÖcy.
Tap at Mikkeller and Friends. Aroma is very fruity, mango tropical, fresh and hoppy too. Great stuff, light sourness, very nice. Further down more citrussy. Really liked this.
Ok some wood weird hoppy aroma of bubblegum, cloudy chunky, good lemon zest light car nation. Not the typical lambic.

Draught @ Mikkeller Bar Victoriagade. Pours hazy burnt golden with a small creamy offwhite head that slowly dissipates while leaving some thick sticky lacing on the glass. Smell is fruity and funky with sourdough crackers, lemon juice, grapefruit juice, yuzu juice, mango, pineapple, moist grass, pine needles, leather, dry soil, barnyard, horse blanket and lemon zest. Taste is sour, tiny bitter, fruity and funky. Mouthfeel is dry, tart, oily, tiny mouth-puckering, tiny astringent and medium bodied. Finish is sour and tiny bitter with sourdough crackers, lemon juice, grapefruit juice, mango, pineapple, passion fruit, moist grass, pine needles, dry soil, barnyard, watermelon rinds and lemon zest. Hoppy sour bliss. Yum-a-dum!
Tap @ Mikkeller and Friends. Pours clear golden with a medium white head. Aroma is juicy, citrussy, green apples, hops, lemon zest. Taste is sour, citrus fruits, green apples, hops, light funk.

330ml bottle, pours clear light gold, small head. Aroma is medium sour lambic style, the dry hopping is subtle. It is a tasty lambic style beer with a little nuance. Light bodied, oily, lively carbonation with a dry, sour end.
Flaska Bishops arms √∂rebro. Dimmig orange kul√∂r. Syrlig och j√§stig doft med Tuttifrutti. Frisk smak med h√§rlig syra och fruktighet. Syran f√•r smilbanden att dra upp till tinningen.
Draught at Mikkeller Bar, Copenhagen, Denmark. Clear golden, medium white head. Tropical fruits, grapefruit, peels, some funk. Light to mmedium bodied, medium carbonation. Dry, medium acidity.

Keg, Brewdog Leicester. Golden with a thin white head. Tart lemon with green apple and funky cheesiness. Woody and dry with biscuity champagne malts. Earthy apple skin with some peachy sweetness. Floral yeastiness with a sour, vinegar palate. Very good.

Draight Cerveteca Lisbon. Hazy amber color, white head. Sour taste with citrus, hops, sour apples, earthy notes, tart and grass. Sour finish with citrus, hops, earthy notes, tart and sour apples. Very nice lambic.

15th July 2015Lightly hazy gold beer, tidy pale cream colour head. Palate is dry and crisp. Mild sourness and a touch of seltzer. Decent Mosaic fruits - tangy orange and a touch of passion fruit. Touch of lemon. Light semi dry finish. Pretty drinkable.
On tap at artbeerfest Caminha. Dark gold color. Medium head. High sourness. Aroma is bretty, fruity, spices, grassy, hoppy.

(330ml bottle @ VilleValla Pub, Link√∂ping, Jul 11 2015) Pours slightly hazy gold with a big fluffy white head and lace. Aroma of wood, lemony funk, grapefruit, orange peel, blueberries/raspberries/strawberries, faint tropical fruit, tart, grassy. Flavour lactic with a lemon and cracker core, raspberry, grapefruit juice, wet grass, gooseberry, tart, some wood. Drier and woody in the finish but still tart, with a little grain. Medium feel in the mouth with soft carb, extremely drinkable. Maybe lacking the ultimate edge of freshness but a nice combo of hop and sour base, though not as bright in the mouth as the Citra.

Draught @ mikkeller bar. Pours deep amber, thin white head. Tart red berries, some mild vinegary notes. Flavor has tartness, berries, hops, dried apricots. More sweet towards finish. High drinkability. Very good.

Bottle, bb 02/04/20. Golden, almost clear beer with white head. Aromas of tropical fruits, grapes, resin. Taste is highly acidic with light bitter aftertaste with some tannin notes of oak. Combination of mosaic hop and lambic is very interesting. A really decent beer, worth trying. Very refreshing.

Blimey, that¬ís tart. Amber, relatively clear with a decent covering of white head. Initial blast of tropical fruit, and big lemon and lime, on the nose. Light but not too thin, and well carbonated. Really nice balance of fruit and sourness in the taste - apple, pear, citrus, gooseberry, lychee - like a new world white wine with heavy fruit content.

Tap. Hazy golden body with a small white head. Aroma of citrus, lime zest, tropical fruit notes, funk and yeast. Slightly sweet flavor that ends up dry, bitter and quite tart, Light to medium bodied, watery texture and soft carbonation. A very nice Sour. üåüüåüüåüüåü
Superb sour, green fruits and light funk on the aroma, there is a touch of sweet tropical fruit initially , but then thisis blasted away by a harsh but clean sour finish . Delicious .

330 ml bottle from Ammersin 5, Vienna.
Amber, moderate hazy body, with a quite small, creamy, slightly yellow head.
Aroma of barnyard, passion fruit, apples, sour cherries, lemongrass, sour citrus.
Taste is sour, dry, a bit salty, with barnyard, lemongrass, green apples, pears, basement, subtle berries.
Medium mouthfeel, with a quite soft carbonation.
Finishes sour, dry, with pears, sour apples.

Very nice. The nose is very balanced with a lot of fruity hops and sour notes, while the taste is more straight sour, with interesting pear notes. Quite complex, but easy to drink and refreshing.

Draft @ mikkellerbarsthlm
Hoppy aroma with some sour feeling. Medium body, light bitterness. Light sour. Long finish

330ml bottle at home shared by Saeglopur, many thanks. yellow hazy color, small off-white head. smells quite fruity, some funk, sour cherries, green apples, grass, citric notes, some wood. light to medium body, light bubbly carbonation, light mouthfeel. tastes citric, acidic, sour, strong taste of green apples, light cherries, almonds, some herbs, berrries. finishes quite dry and sour with notes of pears and apples. quite nice, I liked the taste a bit more than the smell, rather complex but easily drinkable because of the low ABV.

Drucken p√• fat p√• Bishop. Inte alls lika kraftig syra som i m√•nga andra i spontanserien. Ist√§llet massor av frukt i en ganska komplex doft och smak. Tropisk frukt, citrus, jordgubbar, lite jord, lite syltig men √§nd√• tydlig syra. Riktigt trevlig och god- tack Daniel!
33 cl bottle @ home. Pours slightly cloudy amber with a white head that leaves a little lacing. Aroma and flavour are citrus, funk and wood - with a tart finish.

At a tasting, many thanks, smallish bubbly head, quite clear golden color, aroma of guava with notes of vinegar and wood, flavor of lemon and a melange of fruit, puckering sourness. Extremely refreshing and highly enjoyable.

Bottle sample at a tasting at Max¬ís place. Thanks Ariel. Clear golden. Lovely aroma, funky, sweaty, with lots of tropical and citric fruity hops, and oak. Sour flavor, funky, oaky, with fruity hops, oak and lacto. Medium-bodied. Great stuff, very refreshing.

Hazy orange aroma, nice white head. Aroma of sweet fruits, citrus, orange, barnyard, funky, wine, acidic. Taste is medium to high sour, dry. Flavor of lemon, grapes, wine. Aftertaste is dry, tart, funky, lemon and herbal flavor. Light to medium body, medium carbonation. Tasty.
PunkAGM2015 rate catchup from notes. 6/6/15. This was at Brewdog Aberdeen. Sour and funky. Sharp and highly carbonated. Not a fan I¬ím afraid and it suffered from following the Mikkeller Black 2014

330ml bottle from Cornelius. Pours clear gold, thin white head, nice lacing. Aromas of sharp sour funk, some vegetation, lemon end of citrus. Taste is sour lemons, sherbet, yeast. Medium body, chalky sour finish.

Tap @ basement beer bar. Aroma is tart hops. Clear golden with small lasting white head. Very sour, some sweetness in the end. Light body, thin feel, lively carbonation, dry and sour finish. The aroma of mosaic lingers.

Rund s√§uerlicher, deutlich hopfigerer Antrunk als die Citra Version. Steigende aber noch moderate S√§ure, mild herb, vollmundig. Die S√§ure bleibt √ºber lange Zeit konstant, der Hopfen wirkt zum Ende etwas dumpf. Rundes gelungenes Saures. 11/11/12/11/11/11

Keg at Brewdog, Shepherds Bush, London. A hazy golden/amber coloured pour with a medium white head on top. Fruity, citrus, acidic aroma. Tastes similar, fruity, sour, grapefruit, citrus, quite dry. Not usually my style of beer but this was decent.

From tap, hazy pale amber with medium head. Aroma with notes of citrus, apple, grass and some pine. Taste is bitter/sour, light and refreshing with a dry finish. Very well balanced and interesting. More apples in the taste mixed with mango/citrus and some grass/hay. Very nice!

Draught. Light hazy orange liquid with small to medium white head. Aroma of lemon, fresh hops, tangerine, mineral, apples and light funk. Taste is dry and medium sour with notes of apples, lemons and fresh hops. Light to medium bodied with medium to high carbonation. Pretty nice.

Drucken p√• fat p√• Bishop. Inte alls lika kraftig syra som i m√•nga andra i spontanserien. Ist√§llet massor av frukt i en ganska komplex doft och smak. Tropisk frukt, citrus, jordgubbar, lite jord, lite syltig men √§nd√• tydlig syra. Riktigt trevlig och god. En glad √∂veraskning.

Keg at the Bottle Shop - London. Pours unclear gold with a frothy white head. The aroma holds grassy hops, earth, pale bread, ripening citrus. Light sweet flavor with faint buttered biscuits, dank grass, moist hay, bread, tart lemon. Light to medium bodied with fine to average carbonation. Lightly oily on the finish with more lemony tartness, grass, some drying woodiness, orange rind. Not bad.

Draught at Warpigs.
Hazy amber colored with a small white head.
Fruity and light acidic aroma of hops, oak and barnyard.
Light acidic flavor of oak and barnyard.
Tart finish.

Keg at BD on the Bush, 22/05/15.
Very lightly hazed golden orange with a decent set of off white spottage avec swirl.
Nose is citric sherbets, funk, light wood must, damp hay, restrained mosaic reposte. 
Taste comprises lemon rind, citric fizz, damp straw, light acidic overcoat, grape must, damp wood, earthy, lighter hop presence than the nose.
Medium bodied, fine carbonation, dry curtain call with a mosaic presence amid gentle puckering. 
Solid affair.
user_location: Hazlemere, the lower Xhitlerns, Buckinghamshire, ENGLAND

text: Bottle. Golden with white head. Aroma is funky, sharp, some citrus. Taste is funky and fruity, citrus with an earthy yeasty finish. Sour. Decent

Keg at BD Shoreditch. It pours hazy orange with a small white head. The nose is juicy orange, apricot, mango, funk, must, damp leaves, candied peel and a touch of blue cheese. The taste is tart, earthy, barnyard, funk, orange sherbet, white currant, gooseberry, white grape skin, some sharp acidity, grapefruit, hay, must and damp wood with a dry finish. Medium body and fine carbonation. Rather pleasant and quaffable. Good balance for sure.

Tap at BrewDog Manchester. Slightly hazy orange shade. Thin head that quickly disappears. Very juicy with orange peel and melon notes. Lovely dryness and bitter, hoppy linger on the palate. I¬íve struggled to get into mosaic beers but this is really nice.
Tap at Pale Ale Festival Pours cloudy golden with a white head. Aroma and Taste of Yeast, Tart, Berries, Bitter Mosaic hops. Decent Nice Drinkability :)

Bottle thanks to Maxie! Pours a clear, light golden with a medium sized, white head. Aroma is very juicy with a blend of hops and citric yeast. Lemon zest, tangerine, tart. Taste is sour, citric and tart with a slight sweet fruityness. Medium carbonation and crisp body.
From tap. Pours hazy orange with a small white head. Aroma is citric. Smooth fruity. Citric. Fruity and slight sourish. Smooth fruity and crisp citric finish.

Draft @ Warpigs, Copenhagen. Pours a slightly hazy golden pale orange color with a small white head. Has a fruity sour citrus hoppy aroma. Fruity sour tart citrus hoppy flavor. Has a fruity sour tart citrus hoppy finish.
Bottle from Cotteridge Wines; hazy golden amber pour with a frothy off white head, aroma has lime and some peach action, taste has citrus and funk, grapefruit, orange, quite dry finish.

Draught at Mikkeller Bar Viktoriagade, Copenhagen. Hazy golden beer with a small head. Souring hoppy citrus aroma, vinous, berries, grapefruit, pine apple notes. Souring hop flavor, grassy, hay, caramel, floral, citrus, grapefruit notes. Very refreshing.

30.04.2015, tap @ Mikkeller Bar:
Nice creamy longlasting head. Aroma is fresh citrusy, fresh hops, citrus peel, sorrel, citrus acid, soda powder, pine needles, bark, leafs, lawn, lemon juice. Taste is fresh citrusy, sorrel, citrus peel, soda powder, rope, fresh hops, leafs, citrus acid, bark, grass, lemon juice. Longlasting bitterness, dry mouthfeel. Love it!

On tap at Mikkeller The Original. Hazy orange with a small white head. Herbal and grassy aroma with fruity notes, and light funk. Sharp tart flavour with fruity notes, herbal hops and an unpleasant popcorn note.
Tap @ Mikkeller Stefansgade, CPH. Poured cloudy golden with a white head. Funk, yeast and hops. Fruity and dry with a mild hint of popcorn.
Bottle shared at pre-CBC tasting at Fermentoren. Hazy golden pour with lacings. Melon, mangoes, funk, citrus zest and some light funk.
Draught at Mikkeller Bar. High creamy fluffy white head. Hazy amber ody. Mild hoppy grass aroma grapefruit aroma and flaovr with fair amount of hops bitterness, low carbonation and a short finish.

Draught at Mikkeller&Friends. Cloudy amber - white head. Nice mellow sourness, earthy, light gooseberries, wooden, light tart, ok hoppy, fruity hoppy, citrus, light tropical notes in the finish, citrus, grape fruits. Nice high drinkability.
